object.name: Address
object.desc: This element contains address data, some of which is defined by the BS7666 International Address and Geographic Location Specification. Other elements are present for historical reasons.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Code that defines the address type. CBDS: 100102, 100173

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally assigned identifier for this address in the publishing system.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Date person began using this address. CBDS: 100146

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Date person stopped using this address. CBDS: 100147

element.name: PAON
element.desc: An element defining the Primary Addressable Object Name (PAON), typically a building number or house name.

element.name: SAON
element.desc: The Secondary Addressable Object Name (SAON), identifying a sub-division of the PAON, typically a flat number, room number or unit in a commerical property.

element.name: Street
element.desc: The name of the street. CBDS: 100115, 100186, S65

element.name: Locality
element.desc: The locality name refers to a neighbourhood, suburb, district, village, estate, settlement, or parish that may form part of a town, or stand in its own right within the context of an administrative area. Where an industrial estate contains streets it is defined as a locality in its own right. At least one of Locality, Town, or AdministrativeArea must be specified. CBDS: 100116, 100187, S66

element.name: Town
element.desc: The city name refers to a city or town that is not an adminstrative area, a suburb of an administrative area that does not form part of another town or a London district. At least one of Locality, Town, or AdministrativeArea must be specified. CBDS: 100117, 100188, S67

element.name: AdministrativeArea
element.desc: The administrative area is a geographic area that may be the highest level local administrative area, and may be a county or a unitary authority, an island or island group, or London. At least one of Locality, Town, or AdministrativeArea must be specified CBDS: 100118, 100189, S68

element.name: County
element.desc: Where applicable, the name of the county.

element.name: PostTown
element.desc: Post Office usually assigns these based on Sorting Office. CBDS: 100119, 100190, S68a

element.name: PostCode
element.desc: The code allocated by the Post Office to identify a group of postal delivery points. Valid Postcode formats are: A9 9AA, A99 9AA, AA9 9AA, AA99 9AA, A9A 9AA, AA9A 9AA, Plus BFPO 999 CBDS: 100120, 100121, 100192, S69a

element.name: Country
element.desc: Country where physical address is located, if known. Usually this is going to be 'GBR' but could be elsewhere if associated with the military, etc.

element.name: UniquePropertyReferenceNumber
element.desc: The unique Property and Land Reference Number (UPRN) for this address. Numeric: 1 to 12 digits. CBDS: 100123, 100193, 100194, S70a

element.name: UniqueStreetReferenceNumber
element.desc: The unique Property Street Reference Number (USRN) for this address. Numeric: 1 to 8 digits. CBDS: 100125, 100195, 100196, S71a

element.name: LocationContext
element.desc: The physical location of an address in terms of Census District, LA Electoral Ward, Parliamentary Constituency, and other defining location-centric characteristics.

element.name: GridLocation
element.desc: The physical property location coordinates

object.name: AddressableObjectName
object.desc: Encapsulates the Addressable Object elements from BS766

element.name: Description
element.desc: Dwelling name, or at least a general description of the location in lieu of having any other information. This is required when no other PAON or SAON information is provided. CBDS: 100114, 100185, S548

element.name: StartNumber
element.desc: Start (single) dwelling number. CBDS: 100110, 100181, S544

element.name: StartNumberSuffix
element.desc: Start (single) dwelling number suffix. CBDS: 100111, 100182, S545

element.name: EndNumber
element.desc: End dwelling number. CBDS: 100112, 100183, S546

element.name: EndNumberSuffix
element.desc: End dwelling number suffix. CBDS: 100113, 100184, S547

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: This attribute specifies what type of alert message this is.

element.name: AlertMsg
element.desc: This is an alert message that is associated with the student.

value.name: SECONDARY_CERTIFICATE
value.desc: One or more of the following Secondary certificates: Certificate of Baptism; Marriage Certificate; National Health Service Medical Card; Child's Certificate of Vaccination; Child's Health Record Card; A certificate of Service in HM Forces or other employment under the Crown or in the Mercantile Marine; A certificate of membership of a Trade Union Friendly Society or any cards or papers relating to membership of an Approved Society or Unemployment Insurance Apprenticeship indentures; Early certificate or testimonial from employer; Aliens registration card, certificate of naturalisation, Home Office travel document or a passport; Life insurance policy; Certificate of confirmation; School certificate or report; A birthday book or old family record; Family Bible containing a record of birth.

value.name: FULL_CERTIFICATE
value.desc: One of the following: Full certificate; Birth certificate short form; Certificate of registry showing given names and family name; GRO copy; Adoption Order issued by the High Court, County Court or Juvenile Court; Certificate of adoption issued by the GRO; Foreign birth certificate issued by registration authority of the foreign country.

object.name: Contact
object.desc: Information on contact persons for a school or LA.

attribute.name: SIF_RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the person listed as a contact. Note that this is any person listed as a contact through either a ContactPersonal, WorkforcePersonal, or even a LearnerPersonal record.

attribute.name: SIF_RefObject
attribute.desc: The name of the object being referred to

element.name: PositionTitle
element.desc: The contact person's position title within the LA.

element.name: Role
element.desc: Role played by this contact in the LA. Any descriptive text is allowed here.

element.name: PublishInDirectory
element.desc: Indicates whether or not this contact's information should be published in a directory of School or LA information.

object.name: ContactInfo
object.desc: Common element used to supply information for a contact person at a school, LA, or other institution. This element is used in Vertical Reporting

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of the contact person.

element.name: PositionTitle
element.desc: The contact person's position title.

element.name: Role
element.desc: Role played by this contact in this instance.

element.name: Address
element.desc: Address of the contact.

element.name: EmailList
element.desc: List of Email elements.

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: List of PhoneNumber elements.

object.name: ContactList
object.desc: A list of contact persons associated with a school or LA.

element.name: Contact
element.desc: Information on contact persons for this school or LA.

object.name: CountriesOfCitizenship
object.desc: A list of the countries in which this person has legal nationality.

element.name: CountryOfCitizenship
element.desc: The country of legal nationality (i.e. the country which issued the individual's passport). CBDS: 100026

object.name: CountriesOfResidency
object.desc: A list of the countries in which this person has residency

element.name: CountryOfResidency
element.desc: A person's country of residence.

enum.name: CountryCode
enum.desc: The 3-character alphabetic country code defined by ISO 3166-1 (subset)

value.name: GBR
value.desc: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

object.name: Demographics
object.desc: Demographic information about a learner, contact, workforce member, etc. This element occurs within objects such as LearnerPersonal, LearnerContact, etc.

element.name: EthnicityList
element.desc: A list of the person's ethnicities by proportion.

element.name: BirthDate
element.desc: The person's date of birth. CBDS: 100007

element.name: BirthDateVerification
element.desc: Means by which the person's birth date was validated. CBDS: 100021

element.name: PlaceOfBirth
element.desc: The person's place of birth--like village, town, city etc.

element.name: CountyOfBirth
element.desc: The county in which the person was born.

element.name: CountryOfBirth
element.desc: The individual's country of birth. CBDS: 100028

element.name: CountriesOfCitizenship
element.desc: A list of the countries in which this person has legal nationality.

element.name: CountriesOfResidency
element.desc: A list of the countries in which this person has legal nationality.

element.name: CountryArrivalDate
element.desc: Date the person first arrived in the UK.

element.name: EnglishProficiency
element.desc: Assessment of a learner's progress in English as an Additional Language.

element.name: LanguageList
element.desc: A list of languages spoken by the person The person must be at least somewhat familiar with the language to have it listed here.

element.name: MaritalStatus
element.desc: The person's marital status.

element.name: NonUKSystemImmigrant
element.desc: Indicates the learner has recently arrived from a non-English or other common UK language system. CBDS: 190080, P170

element.name: Refugee
element.desc: Indates the person's refugee/asylum seeker status as defined by the United Nations (Aritcle 1 of the 1951 Refugee Convention). CBDS: 100027

element.name: Religion
element.desc: Definition of a person's religious faith.

element.name: Traveller
element.desc: Identifying information for traveller/gypsy status.

object.name: ElectronicId
object.desc: Identifies an electronic ID (barcode, magstripe, PIN, etc.)

object.name: Email
object.desc: This element represents an e-mail address of one of a number of types.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: This attribute specifies the type of e-mail address.

attribute.name: SIF_Action
attribute.desc: In a Change event, this flag can be used to indicate an element has been deleted from the parent list container. At a minimum the key for the list must also be present.

object.name: EmailList
object.desc: A list of e-mail addresses associated with an individual.

object.name: EnglishProficiency
object.desc: Assessment of a learner's progress in English as an Additional Language.

element.name: EALSteps
element.desc: Based on QCA Steps. (England) CBDS: 100052

element.name: EALAcquisition
element.desc: Based on a differing scale from QCA Steps. (Wales) CBDS: 190100

element.name: Code
element.desc: The general ethnic category which reflects the individual's recognition of his or her community or with which the individual most identifies. England Values: Learner Ethnic Codes, Employee Ethniciy. Wales Values: EthnicCodes (Wales)

element.name: Source
element.desc: Source of inidividual's recorded ethnic code.

value.name: WHITE_AND_ANY_OTHER_ASIAN
value.desc: White and Any Other Asian Background

value.name: ASIAN_AND_ANY_OTHER_ETHNIC
value.desc: Asian and Any Other Ethnic Group

value.name: BLACK_AND_ANY_OTHER_ETHNIC
value.desc: Black and Any Other Ethnic Group

value.name: CHINESE_AND_ANY_OTHER_ETHNIC
value.desc: Chinese and Any Other Ethnic Group

value.name: WHITE_AND_ANY_OTHER_ETHNIC
value.desc: White and Any Other Ethnic Group

value.name: ANY_NEW_GCSE_VOCATIONAL
value.desc: Any new GCSE in a vocational subject

object.name: GridLocation
object.desc: This element contains a map location. The GridLocation element is utilised within other objects and elements.

element.name: PropertyEasting
element.desc: Easting coordinate for mapping an address. CBDS: 100126, 100197, S72

element.name: PropertyNorthing
element.desc: Northing coordinate for mapping an address. Required when PropertyEasting is also specified. CBDS: 100127, 100198, S73

element.name: Latitude
element.desc: Geographical coordinate.

element.name: Longitude
element.desc: Geographical coordinate. Required when Latitude is also specified.

element.name: Code
element.desc: This is the code that specifies the person's language. CBDS: 100046, 100047, 100171, P158

element.name: Fluent
element.desc: Indicates that the person is fluent in this language. SOURCE: 190050

element.name: TypeList
element.desc: A list of the person's language types.

element.name: Source
element.desc: Source of data on use of the specified language.SOURCE: 190052, P161a

element.name: Study
element.desc: The level in which the learner is taught this language at school. 100045, 100327, 190051, P159

element.name: StudyOther
element.desc: Indicates whether the learner studies subjects in this language at school separate from studying the language itself. SOURCE: 190054, P163

value.name: BELIEVED_TO_BE_OTHER_THAN
value.desc: Believed to be Other than English

value.name: TAUGHT_WELSH_AS_A_FIRST
value.desc: Taught Welsh as a first language

value.name: TAUGHT_WELSH_AS_A_SECOND
value.desc: Taught Welsh as a second language

value.name: DISAPPLIED_FROM_CURRICULUM_BY
value.desc: Disapplied from curriculum by SEN statement

object.name: LanguageUsageList
object.desc: A list of the person's language types.

element.name: Type
element.desc: A typification of the language. i.e. how is this language used?

object.name: LanguageUsageType
object.desc: A typification of the language. i.e. how is this language used?

object.name: LocationContext
object.desc: The physical location of an address in terms of Census District, LA Electoral Ward, Parliamentary Constituency, and other defining location-centric characteristics.

element.name: CensusDistrict
element.desc: National Population Census Enumeration District. CBDS: 100148

element.name: WardCode
element.desc: ONS Ward Code CBDS: 100149

element.name: WardName
element.desc: ONS Ward Name CBDS: 100150

element.name: ConstituencyCode
element.desc: ONS Parliamentary Constituency Code CBDS: 100151

element.name: ConstituencyName
element.desc: ONS Parliamentary Constituency Name CBDS: 100152

element.name: Parish
element.desc: ONS Parish Council Name CBDS: 100153

element.name: ChurchOfEnglandDiocese
element.desc: Church of England Diocese CBDS: 100154

element.name: ChurchOfEnglandParish
element.desc: Church of England Parish CBDS: 100155

element.name: RomanCatholicDiocese
element.desc: Roman Catholic Diocese CBDS: 100156

element.name: RomanCatholicParish
element.desc: Roman Catholic Parish CBDS: 100157

element.name: LSCouncilCode
element.desc: Learning and Skills Council area code CBDS: 100158

element.name: CatchmentArea
element.desc: School catchment area description CBDS: 100159

value.name: NOT_MARRIED
value.desc: Not married (never married, legally divorced, widowed, or marriage annulled)

attribute.name: Severity
attribute.desc: The level of severity of this medical alert.

element.name: MedicalAlertMsg
element.desc: Medical alert associated with the student.

object.name: Name
object.desc: The Name element defines name information for a person and occurs within objects such as WorforcePersonal, LearnerPersonal, ContactPersonal, etc.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Code that specifies what type of name this is

element.name: Title
element.desc: A title or prefix associated with the name. If any of: Mr, Mrs, Ms, Miss, Rev, Fr, Dr, Prof, Hon, Sir, Lord, Lady - these must be as shown, otherwise free text. Note that title is not applicable to learners. CBDS: 100161

element.name: FamilyName
element.desc: Full legal family name. That part of the person's name which is used to describe family, clan, tribal group, or marital association. Note that this element is always required. However, when associated with a contact it may not be possible to know the family name in which case you should add the available information to the FullName element. CBDS: 100003, 100162, 100288, 100280, 900001

element.name: GivenName
element.desc: Full given name (forename) of the person. Note that this element is always required. However, when associated with a contact it may not be possible to know the given name in which case you should add the available information to the FullName element. CBDS: 100004, 100163, 100164, 100289, 100006, 100281, 900002

element.name: MiddleNames
element.desc: All other given or middle names, each separated with a single space character. CBDS: 100006, 100164

element.name: FamilyNameFirst
element.desc: An indicator used to identify the naming conventions used by some predominantly non-European, ethnic or language groups and related to the display nature of a name.. CBDS: 100282, 900003

element.name: PreferredFamilyName
element.desc: The family name preferred most by the person (as written). CBDS: 100011, 100285, 900006

element.name: PreferredFamilyNameFirst
element.desc: An indicator used to identify the naming conventions used by some predominantly non-European, ethnic or language groups and related to the display nature of a name.. CBDS: 100012, 100286, 900007

element.name: PreferredGivenName
element.desc: The given name preferred most by the person (as written). CBDS: 100010, 100284, 900005

element.name: Suffix
element.desc: Textual suffix like PHD, JP, BSc.

element.name: FullName
element.desc: A free text field for the complete name for display purposes.

value.name: NOT_FOLLOWED
value.desc: National Curriculum not followed – available only for Special Schools where pupils are not following a particular NC Year

object.name: NCYearGroup
object.desc: Code representing a National Curriculum Year Group.

object.name: NCYearGroupList
object.desc: This is a common element used to specify a collection of supported National Curriculum Year Groups. It is used in SchoolInfo and assessment-related objects.

element.name: NCYearGroup
element.desc: Code representing a National Curriculum year group.

object.name: OtherId
object.desc: Describes an alternate ID for a person

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Code that defines the type of this other ID. Note: A subset of valid values may be specified in data objects.

enum.name: OtherIdType
enum.desc: Codes that define valid types for OtherId elements

object.name: PersonalInformation
object.desc: This element contains basic personal and demographic information related to a person. This element is part of all "personal" objects, including LearnerPersonal, WorkforcePersonal, and ContactPersonal.

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name information for this person. CBDS: Multiple

element.name: OtherNames
element.desc: A list of other names associated with this person.

element.name: Email
element.desc: The person's preferred e-mail address. CBDS: 100071, LP

element.name: OtherEmailList
element.desc: The person's other e-mail address(es).

element.name: Address
element.desc: The person's current physical address. CBDS: 100102

element.name: OtherAddressList
element.desc: The person's other address(es). CBDS: 100102

element.name: PhoneNumber
element.desc: The person's preferred phone number.

element.name: OtherPhoneNumberList
element.desc: The person's other phone number(s).

element.name: ElectronicIdList
element.desc: Electronic identifier(s) associated with this person.

element.name: OtherIdList
element.desc: A list of all "other" IDs associated with this person.

object.name: PhoneNumber
object.desc: This element represents a phone number and occurs within objects such as LearnerPersonal, WorkforcePersonal, etc.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Code that specifies the phone number type. CBDS: 100144, 100217, S86

attribute.name: SIF_Action
attribute.desc: In a Change event, this flag can be used to indicate an element has been deleted from the parent list container. At a minimum the key for the list must also be present.

element.name: Number
element.desc: Phone number. Validation: 0-9 and a leading '+' (for international calls). CBDS: 100145, 100218, S87

element.name: Extension
element.desc: Phone number extension.

element.name: ListedStatus
element.desc: Indicates whether or not the phone number is available to the public.

object.name: PhoneNumberList
object.desc: Lists phone numbers associated with an entity.

object.name: Religion
object.desc: Definition of a person's religious faith.

element.name: AffiliationCode
element.desc: Person's religious faith. CBDS: 100029

element.name: EducationStatus
element.desc: Indicates whether the person is actively attending religious education classes. CBDS: 100030

element.name: CollectiveWorshipStatus
element.desc: Indicates whether the person is participating in religious collective worship. CBDS: 100031

element.name: Source
element.desc: Source of person's religious affiliation code. CBDS: 100058

element.name: SIF_RefObject
element.desc: The name of the "personal" object that this picture represents. Values: LearnerPersonal, WorkforcePersonal, ContactPersonal

object.name: SubjectAreaList
object.desc: A list of subject areas.

element.name: SubjectArea
element.desc: Subject matter.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code to identify type of traveller/gypsy.

element.name: Source
element.desc: Source of individual's recorded traveller/gypsy code.
